about_text: Mae govannen na Uncanny Coffee Hour, ias i-thû o yl vín hwindia na chîth en-dhu. Im sâdh com-maethad an-ngurth ann-dhu en-Arda—ias i-mên iaur en-Edhil govadia i-ardh dhúath en-Yokai.

Horthannen o Odd Bob a Dr. Kitsuné (Mitch), i-chîr vín nûm sui thond vín. Dr. Kitsuné padra i-iant im ist iaur a'n nern faer-bain en-Japan, toga men trî i-ardh en-Yokai a nern iaur. Odd Bob toga hûn randir American go faer nwedhannen na rûth Celtic, ui-aphada i-gûl gwanu en-Edhil. Go Saoirse, i-Phúca vín, padra men i-lîr im i-ist a'n ú-car.
Savo men i nern-bain gar hûn-dring en-then. Go nîdh a ar-faer, savo men i-lamm iaur im men, a hortho tîr nûm na ist iaur. Im sí an-anno lam na pen-lam a cened i-lîr faer i nwedha men bain.
I-tam has, gwîa im ind vín an-idhrinn. I-yl urn, i-gwath ann, a'n nern dartho.
aboutpage.friendo_desc: Sin mellyn en-nern a hûd maer i savo men anno suil:
aboutpage.aitext: Pen-tîr. Gar men (si) qu'ann-lu an-garo aes a sâdh im ardh balch. Im i-tam maer... car men hen ann-lu, ach, boe cened mên an-padra ceint sí a ennas a gûl-nauth sta savo men horto i-nern a lamm-gûl i mel sâf. I-cerm nern na gwanod en-adan a gûl-nauth a prest o nern na nern.
aboutpage.what_podtext: Nautho hen sui nern-radio o'n lu gwann... sui havad o-galadh a lastad Buck Rogers egor The Shadow... ach ú-lastad na lu-cîw, tur lastad ir anír sâf! Ar-commo o-gûl-nauth egor palantir-beg... urno i-thû... a lasto!

eppage.title: I-Gwanod Pain
eppage.transcript: Tec-lam ennas na buzzsprout (tiro i-tec-lam luyg na nern).
eppage.subhead: Nern-bain ú-vân a yl pant, teithannen na lu-dâf.

footer.copyright: The Dr Kitsuné & Odd Bob Uncanny Coffee Hour

hero.title: Nern-Ruist Gwain
hero.subtext: Nern-lam te i-prest gûl o nern-lamm. Uncanny Coffee Hour lacha nern iaur a rûth gwain... min yl na lu.

homepage.buycoffeesupport: Tugo men na Buy Me a Coffee
homepage.whisperwellhead: Gar sâf Nern Ú-vân o anim?
homepage.whisperwellsubhead: Lo i-Eithel Luss a ma savo men hen na nern-lam.

lodgepage.title: Mento men! Tugo i-nern!
lodgepage.subhead: Gwanod-bain car sâdh en-thâm a tugo pedo i-nern i anír men bain si.

misctext.error_text: Thêl Púca car rî en-tec men! I-luyg na ardh-faer (egor gûl-dâf) carannen.

1.title: I-Longma Mel
1.desc: Nern pen-dâf, lacha na Thâm-Palantir, suil na nern-lam.

2.title: I-Faer Bron
2.desc: Maer 1 AM: Sâdh-Holl Saoirse (nern-am), pedo-Edhil ann & i-dâf bo nern.

3.title: I-Brownie Maer
3.desc: Maer 1 & 2 AM: Suil-lam sui Hîr-Car, Cerm-Pân (Tâd-lo-Ennin), Yl go Hîr (Palantir-Gwanod).

4.title: Mellyn Kitsune a Tanuki!
4.desc: Maer-bain AM: Car men Yokai o-anim a can nern dîn na nern-lam.

storypage.title: Mento Nern Ú-vân Lín
storypage.subhead: Cennich i-Phúca? I-yl lín sav sui faer-hûl? Peno men.
